column4: I guess I'll just wait till someone who can help me is not so busy.
So, who knows about video cards?
Volari, it was supposed to be supported. V3Xt-128A
MALKO must be a popular name.
so... are volari cards supported? I know ther are linux drivers but I have no clue how to install them.
do you have a driver at hand?
did you ever find the file type of that driver?
np just copy and past the full file name here
can you do a ls -l on your desktop for me?
thats the whole command ls -l   got to love Linuz
we could do that, or ssh
